class.name: CallErrorInfo
class.brief_description: Information pertaining to error reporting on called functions.
class.description: Information pertaining to error reporting on called functions. This object is used in conjunction with [method Object.call_with_error_test].

method.name: get_call_inner_error
method.description: Return the inner error type, which represents the first (if any) error caused by subsequent function calls within this function call. [b]Note:[/b] This can return [constant CALL_OK] even when [method get_call_error] returns an error, and vice versa.

method.name: get_expected_arguments
method.description: Return the amount of arguments expected (when the error is too many or too few arguments).

method.name: get_invalid_argument_index
method.description: Return the index of the invalid argument (when the error is an invalid argument).

method.name: get_invalid_argument_type
method.description: Return the expected type for the invalid argument (when the error is an invalid argument).

method.name: set_call_error
method.description: Sets the error. For invalid arguments [param argument] is the argument index and [param expected] is the expected variant type. For too few or too many arguments, [param argument] is the expected argument count.

method.name: set_call_inner_error
method.description: Sets the inner error, which represents the first (if any) error caused by subsequent function calls within this function call.

constants.constant: At least one argument of the call was invalid (the type was not the right one).
More arguments were passed to the call than expected.
Fewer arguments were passed to the call than expected.
A call happened on a null object instance.
A constant call happened in a non-const function.
